entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 15. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening with risk of freezing rain. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 15. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 22 overnight. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy in the morning then snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming east 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 11 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:06 PM MST Monday 26 December 2022
